message: Can anyone gives me his feedback from his previous experience  about Kendo UI ?

data.message: also any other recommendations will be gr8

terrific, i'm working with it for 6 months, but my advice for you 
Don't go for the server side wrappers, go for the pure JS lib. directly (highly extensible & configurable)

Well, It's pretty nice we've done some mobile apps with it but one thing that we've faced here is that it's documentation is not that good. may be because we used it pretty early when it was first released I'm not sure about the docs right now but a quick look says it has changed :). I've also done some work with Jquery Ui and it's also pretty nice as well and the documentation is very very good.

check out this site for comparison between the two
http://jqueryuivskendoui.com/
